bookSourceGroup: 🔭 其他,🎊 常用,🎨 漫画
exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style:{\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = [
    '韩国',
    '连载',
    '完结',
    '日本',
    '连载',
    '完结'
];
tag = [
    '全部',
    '全部',
    '全部',
    '出版漫画',
    '出版漫画',
    '出版漫画'
];
end = [
    '-0',
    '0',
    '1',
    '-0',
    '0',
    '1'
];
for (i in title) {
    url1 = `{{Get('url')}}/booklist?tag=${tag[i]}&area=1&end=${end[i]}`;
    url2 = '&page={{page}}';
    url = url1 +url2;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(title[i], url, 1, 0.25, false));
}
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>
header:
<js>
var Proxy = Map('代理：').split(",");
headers={
    "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/123.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36",
    "proxy": Proxy.some(value => parseInt(value, 10) == parseInt(Get('ci0'), 10)) ? '' : Proxy[0],
}
cache.put(Get('url') + "headers",JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);
</js>

'〖默认〗' : '〖自选〗') + x[Get('ci0')] + (Get('url').length > 26 ? Get('url').substring(0, 26) + "
" + Get('url').substring(26) : Get('url')) + ('\n🔍繁体搜索：' + (Get('search_TC') == true ? '〖自选〗开启' : '〖默认〗关闭')) + ('\n📑简繁转换：' + (Get('TC_to_SC') == true ? '〖默认〗开启' : '〖自选〗关闭')) + ('\n🗃目录整理：' + (Get('settle') == true ? '〖自选〗开启' : '〖默认〗关闭')); changeLog = '\nㅤ\nㅤ\n' + Setting + '\nㅤ\n'; book = JSON.stringify({ 'name': $2('.detail-main-info-title').replace(/[（\(].*/, ''), 'author': $2('.detail-main-info-author.1').replace(/[,&]|[图文][:：]/g, '/').replace(/\/\/\/|\/\//g, '/').replace(/^[\/]/g, '').replace(/\|\//g, '').replace(/\s\/\s/g, '/'), 'kind': s + ',' + k, 'word': '', 'latest': l + '〔' + t + '〕', 'intro': (t != '' ? ('更新时间：' + t + '\nㅤ\n') : '') + $2('p.detail-desc').replace(/.*内容介绍[:：].*/g, '').replace(/(^)/g, '$1
') + ('' + changeLog), 'cover': $3('.detail-main-cover img'), 'url': url, 'durl': '', 'reName': true }); } else { (function Book() { apiBaseUrl = cache.get(`cache_api_${Get('url')}`); json = java.ajax(apiBaseUrl); Title = JSON.parse(json)['title']; Intro = JSON.parse(json)['intro']; return { Title: Title, Intro: Intro }; }()); book = JSON.stringify({ 'kind': book['kind'], 'latest': Title[Title.length - 1], 'intro': Intro[0] }); } Put(book);

var User = '';
var Title = '';
var Link = '';
var Intro = '';
user_Check();
var data = [];
var Headers = JSON.parse(cache.get(Get('url') + "headers").replace(Get('url'), baseUrl));
var Option = {
    "method": "GET",
    "headers": Headers
};
if (User == true) {
    var list = java.getElements('.manga-list-2 li');
    var $ = element => String(list[i].select(element).text());
    for (i = 0; i < list.length; i++) {
        data.push({
            'name': $('.manga-list-2-title a'),
            'author': $('.book-list-info-bottom-item').replace(/[,&]|[图文][:：]/g, '/').replace(/\/\/\/|\/\//g, '/').replace(/^[\/]/g, '').replace(/\|\//g, '').replace(/\s\/\s/g, '/'),
            'kind': '',
            'word': '',
            'latest': $('.manga-list-2-tip a').replace(/已更新\s/, '第'),
            'intro': '',
            'cover': list[i].select('img').attr('data-original'),
            'url': Get('url') + list[i].select('a').attr('href')
        });
    }
    var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/page=(\d+)/, function(match, p1) {return 'page=' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
    var next_1 = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(next);
    if (!list[0] || !next_1.select('.manga-list-2 li')[0]) {
        Data();
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);
</js>

String(title).replace(/\s-\s|-/g, ' ').replace(/\s+/, ' ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期](|\s)第.*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期][^\s]/, '$1 ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期]\s\d+/, '$1').replace(/.*第.*(\d+).*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/(\d+)/, title.match(/\d+/) ? order[1].padStart(3, '0') : '$1') : title;
        data.push({
            'title': i == list.length - 1 ? title + '〔' + date + '〕' : title,
            'link': Get('url') + list[i].attr('href')
        });
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data1();
}
Put(data);
</js>

searchUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
(function (e) {
    if (Get('search_TC') == true || e.indexOf('TC') > -1) {
        e = String(java.s2t(e)).replace(/TC/, '');
    }
    return Get('url') + '/search?keyword=' + e;
}(key));
</js>
